paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Mutations influence the kinetics and thermodynamics of misfolding, affecting disease phenotype.

variants.additional_notes: Variants mentioned include V30M, L55P, T119M, V122I.
key_quotes: L55P TTR exhibits severe pathology because the tetramer both dissociates quickly and is highly destabilized.
V122I cardiomyopathy, unlike WT cardiomyopathy, has nearly complete penetrance—presumably because of its 2-fold increase in dissociation rate.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with a significant increase in amyloidogenicity.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is mentioned in the context of its impact on disease severity.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on the TTR gene variants mentioned in the text.
